```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(janitor)
library(broom)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r cars}

voteview <- read_csv("viv_data/high_school.csv", skip = 1) %>%
  clean_names()

voteview <- select(voteview, -starts_with("margin"), -1)
voteview <- voteview[,-c(startsWith(voteview, prefix = "margin"))]
voteview <- separate(voteview, geographic_area_name, c("County", "State"), ",")

```
